description: Decimal expansion of solution to log_10(x) = x - 4.
links: Bernard I Pietsch, For more information
mathematica: digits = 100; x /. FindRoot[ Log[10, x] == x-4, {x, 4}, WorkingPrecision -> digits+5] // RealDigits[#, 10, digits]& // First (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 05 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Bernard I Pietsch (bernard(AT)sonic.net)
extensions: More terms from _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Apr 15 2006
